definition: in a warm manner, of a seeker, make warm or warmer
details:
adverb
- in a warm manner
= example: in a warm manner
= synonyms: warmly
adjective
- of a seeker
= synonyms: hot, cold
- uncomfortable because of possible danger or trouble
= example: uncomfortable because of possible danger or trouble
- characterized by liveliness or excitement or disagreement
= example: characterized by liveliness or excitement or disagreement
- characterized by strong enthusiasm
= synonyms: ardent
- easily aroused or excited
= synonyms: quick
- freshly made or left
= example: freshly made or left
= synonyms: strong
- having or displaying warmth or affection
= synonyms: tender, fond, affectionate, lovesome
- having or producing a comfortable and agreeable degree of heat or imparting or maintaining heat
= example: having or producing a comfortable and agreeable degree of heat or imparting or maintaining heat
- psychologically warm
- (color) inducing the impression of warmth
verb
- make warm or warmer
= example: make warm or warmer
- get warm or warmer
= example: get warm or warmer
= synonyms: warm up
